title: Guest towel, from a set of six
marks:
Inscription

on twill tape loop, in black: possi
description: small woven towel; hemmed on two sides; light blue and white; horizontal stripe (zigzag effect) at top and bottom; three vertical stripes (zigzag effect)--widest at center; medium blue \"HH\" monogram on center vertical stripe at one end; blue and white twill tape loop at top on back
